reviews.review_text: Ive been using The Maids service for years on and off. They have never once let me down or ever provided less than excellent service. The team that shows up is always very professional, personable and kind. And dealing with Bruce or the assistant managers is always a pleasure. They are extremely accommodating to any needs I may have. For instance, I have two kittens, who started off with poor health. Working with Bruce and the team we tried different schedules or breaks and approaches that created a minimal stress environment for the cats, which mean everything to me. In general, I try to stay up to date on cleaning myself, but after years of degrading back pain, knowing I can rely on The Maids to pick up my slack and keep my apartment looking amazing is a huge relief. Im extremely grateful when I come across businesses that deliver above and beyond expectations. Thank you for years of quality service Services: Standard cleaning , General housekeeping , Deep clean
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Steven , Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. We are so pleased to hear that our team had made your experience pleasant over the years and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I booked The Maids for move out cleaning and they were on time, pleasant and most importantly did a fantastic cleaning job.  Thank you Bruce for helping organize the booking and Natasha and team for all your hard work.  I highly recommend The Maids.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Maria! Thank you so much for your kind words and for choosing The Maids for your move out cleaning. Were thrilled to hear that our team provided fantastic service, and well be sure to pass along your appreciation to Bruce, Natasha, and the rest of the team. We truly appreciate your recommendation!

reviews.review_text: Natasha and her team do always an amazing cleaning job!     Our place sparkles afterwards - also due to their professionalism and warmth they bring to their visit.   I highly recommend the Maids.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Peter! Thank you so much for your kind words and 5-star rating! Were thrilled to hear that Natasha and our team consistently provide amazing cleaning services. We take pride in our professionalism and strive to bring warmth to every visit. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to serving you again!

reviews.review_text: I was looking for a reliable cleaning service and I found the Maids of Vancouver. Excellent value and a hard working friendly team. I have a condo (2 bedroom). You just tell them what you want done and its done. Steve H
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Steve! Thank you so much for your kind words and for choosing Maids of Vancouver. Were thrilled to hear that our team provided you with excellent value and a friendly experience. Were always here to help make your condo shine, so dont hesitate to reach out anytime.

reviews.review_text: I am really pleased with service from The Maids. Communication is great, they arrive with an energetic team and get to work. They bring all of their own supplies and equipment and do a very thorough clean in a short amount of time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Heather , Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I booked The Maids of Vancouver for a one time clean and was very happy with the service provided from booking to the cleaning team leaving. Bruce is very personable and detailed with his communication- I knew exactly what I was paying for. Every spot in the apartment was up to expectations and the equipment/products used were also of great quality. Additionally, because both my husband and I work from home, I was very happy that it only takes 45 minutes since they send a team of 4. Very great company to work with when you want consistent and efficient communication and quality of work! Looking forward to continuing using The Maids of Vancouver :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow Sanna! Thanks for taking time out of your day to review us and for the kind words. Well be sure to share this with  the team as theyll be so pleased to hear how happy you are with the service. We truly appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed the service I received through out the whole process. Bruce and Ana made me feel very valued as a customer and really responsive with emails and calls. The cleaning team arrived on time and were very polite, respectful and friendly. The clean was great and so fast! Signed up for a monthly service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to learn your experience was a positive one. We appreciate your business and thank you for signing up for recurring service. Looking forward to seeing you again next month.

reviews.review_text: I have used the Maids on various occasions and most recently for my move-in/ move-out cleaning. Tamanna and her team were responsible for the most recent jobs.  They were very professional, friendly, efficient, and showed up on time on both occasions. In general, Bruce is always responsive, professional and  tries to accomodate my last minute requests. Keep up the great work! Services: Standard cleaning
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate the positive feedback. It means a lot. We will share this with the team!

reviews.review_text: Bruce & team were clear, reliable responsible & enabled us to get back full deposit. A pleasure to work with them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Charles, Thank you for the positive feedback and for going out of your way to recognize Bruce and the team. They take pride in serving our customers and will be so pleased to hear how happy you are with the service. Look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I have had many cleaning services and would recommend The Maids in a heartbeat.  Their team are amazing and have an extremely effective system for ensuring your home is spotless.  Bruce is very responsive and I have never had a problem adjusting times or services.  Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Jennifer, thank you for the review. See you next time!

reviews.review_text: They arrive on time with a team of people and sweep through the place like a small army leaving everything neat and clean.  If theyre going to be arriving at a little different time, they always let me know.  I have a large dog (whom they love) and two cats and hate housework.  They make my house feel loved and cared for.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Janice, It has been an absolute pleasure to serve you. We really appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We thank you for your business and your loyalty. See you soon.

reviews.review_text: We have been happy customers of The Maids for many years. They do our regular cleaning and we have also had them help us with move-in cleans. All their staff are very professional and friendly. We always receive a notification the day before to confirm time of arrival and the team shows up when they say they will. If by chance they are running late, we will always receive a phone call to let us know. The office staff have been very accommodating to any special scheduling requests. The cleaning team is always cheerful, they do a great job and they are efficient. Moreover, we trust them and they are respectful of our home.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with great feedback, Angela! Our team is dedicated to providing the most thorough clean in the business while maintaining efficiency, promptness and friendliness. We look forward to servicing your home again soon.

reviews.review_text: I had been looking to get my house cleaned regularly for a while now, until a colleage recommended the Maids. I was extremely impressed by the professionalism and quality displayed by the cleaning team as well as Bruce, the owner. My apartment was left spotless after my first initial clean and I have since agreed to a regular cleaning schedule. Hoping to be a happy customer for many years to come.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your glowing review of The Maids, Jade. We re glad we were able to make your shower gleam like new again! We strive to provide clients the most thorough clean in the business, and are glad we exceeded your expectations. Happy customers have helped build our business through word of mouth and referring friends and family, so we appreciate that you took the time to share your great experience with others. If there is anything we can do to make your experience with The Maids even better, please let us know.

reviews.review_text: Amazing and well worth the very reasonable cost! I spent a lot of time looking around for a cleaning service for my apartment before I decided on The Maids, and I honestly couldn t be happier with my choice; the team does a very thorough job each time and their customer service is super responsive and friendly. I highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your five-star review! We look forward to cleaning for you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Ive been using The Maids services for a few months now and have recommended them to all my friends. You get what you pay for with this service! A whole team shows up, always punctual, with all their own equipment and never disappoint. The cleaning equipment and products are all high quality. I have bad allergies to most things but have never once been irritated by the products. Theyre highly efficient and thorough and easily the most professional cleaning company Ive used in Vancouver. The management is also super approachable and flexible and make me feel like my needs are put first. When I have had a couple of minor (VERY MINOR) issues with particular service for example all efforts were made to rectify them immediately, including a discount. Couldnt be happier with The Maids! Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow, thank you for the five-star review! Our entire team at The Maids takes pride in making your life easier (and cleaner!). We sincerely appreciate your business and look forward to cleaning for you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I have been using The Maids for a year now!  They are excellent.  Definitely the best cleaning service I have ever had.  The team is so efficient, very friendly and caring.  They are always ready to do anything special when required.  The way the Covid 19 is being handled makes me feel very safe having them in my home.  Very excited to be seeing my team again.  I missed them! Brenda
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We can t thank you enough for leaving us a five-star review! Our team takes great pride in providing exceptional service and the most thorough clean in the business. Happy customers have helped build our business through word of mouth and referring friends and family, so we appreciate that you took the time to share your great experience with others. If there is anything we can do to make your experience with The Maids even better, please let us know. Stay Safe!

reviews.review_text: So they asked for a review and I asked the lady who runs the team pretty flatly You do a good job every time and Ill write you a review but, I gotta know if your boss is good to you, lets you all take time off when youre sick, that kinda thing. and she was so confused for a sec and then said that of course he does and shes very happy to work there and never had any trouble about things like that. Frankly, theres nothing more important to me than knowing these folks arent treated poorly. Weve had these cleaners coming by since the fall and theyve been great. They show up almost universally on-time or early, clean the place thoroughly (I can see myself in the tile), and theyre all very friendly. The price is good too my partner and I due to the pandemic didnt have to pay for 2 zone bus passes anymore and that was more than enough to pay for 1 visit a month for our 850~ sq foot low-junk apartment in the burbs. We were happy enough with the service that we upped it to 2 visits and thats enough to keep this place in great shape. Theyve been great about the restrictions and so have we, they work in the bedrooms and we go to the living room, they finish in there and we swap so they can do the rest of the place, windows open, air circulating! We can do 2m in the apt no problem. Thank you so much Areli and your team for making our time during the pandemic so much more enjoyable and our space so much more livable! This might be my favourite bill to pay! Service: Standard cleaning
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your glowing review of The Maids! Happy customers have helped build our business through referring friends and family and online review sharing, so we appreciate that you took the time to share your great experience with others. We will be sure to share this review with Estrella and the team that cleaned your house! If there is anything we can do to make your experience with The Maids even better, please let us know.

reviews.review_text: We have been using The Maids for over a year now and very happy with their service. I went through numerous cleaning people in the past due to a lack of quality work. The Maids consistently deliver a high quality of work. The owner, Bruce, is very prompt & professional in how he deals with any concerns or issues.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were so pleased to hear how satisfied you were with our work, Tanya. We look forward to the next time we clean for you and we can certainly get your home on our regular schedule. Thank you for taking time to share your experience on Google!

reviews.review_text: Ive been a Maids client for two years, and own a townhouse in Olympic Village. The team has been consistently friendly, punctual, and reliable: the office staff have been awesome at confirming plans for each bi-weekly service well in advance, and have also been responsive to specific scheduling and planning needs. The on-site cleaners are professional, courteous, punctual, and hard-working: the results speak for themselves! Id recommend The Maids to anyone else looking to maintain a clean, tidy, and sanitary home.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: As one of our long-term customers, we can t thank you enough for taking the time to review us on Google, Joseph. Happy customers have helped build our business through referring friends and family and online review sharing, so we appreciate that you took the time to share your great experience with others. If there is anything we can do to make your experience with The Maids even better, please let us know.

reviews.review_text: I can not say enough about this amazing Company! They are by far the most amazing cleaning Company! The teams are absolutely incredible; they clean everything so perfectly. They re professional, so friendly and have helped me tremendously! I wish I could 10 star them! I highly recommend The Maids! Thank you to Areli and all the teams that come weekly! You re amazing! Thank you again for all your amazing services!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were so pleased to hear how satisfied you were with our work, Shellie. We look forward to the next time we clean for you.  Thank you for taking time to share your experience on Google!

reviews.review_text: Everything was great. Talked to owner, he explained everything that we were going to get with the service and gave us an estimate on the phone and then an official email quote. The crew arrived right on time and finished everything in the time quoted. They even got a stain off the stove top that we thought was permanent. Thank you to the Crew and Bruce Service: Deep clean
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re so happy to hear you had a good experience. We will share this with the team! It was a pleasure to serve you and we look forward to seeing you again. Have a wonderful day!

reviews.review_text: Have used the Maids since 2010. Good value, consistency, & speedy work. We are very happy with the service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mel, we re thrilled to get this kind of feedback.Thank you for taking the time to review us. It is always such a pleasure to serve you and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: the Maids do a wonderful clean and it smells so fresh.  They are always very friendly and co-operative and on time.  It is a pleasure to have them clean my home.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Craig, we appreciate the positive feedback. It means a lot. We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I can not express how amazing this Company is! They are the best Cleaning Service Company we have ever had and will continue using! Extremely professional, friendly and they clean down to small details! Absolutely amazing! I highly recommend The Maids to everyone who need cleaning services! I would 10 star if I could! Thank you so much for all of your services!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your glowing review of The Maids! Happy customers have helped build our business through referring friends and family and online review sharing, so we appreciate that you took the time to share your great experience with others. If there is anything we can do to make your experience with The Maids even better, please let us know.

reviews.review_text: Excellent, reliable, and friendly service. I used their service for a move out clean. The crew of 3 arrived at the appointed time, paid attention to cleaning the areas that I had requested, and finished the job on time.  I was very satisfied with The Maids service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Vicki, were glad to hear your expectations were met for your move-out clean and we hope were able to clean your new home in the future. Stay Safe!

reviews.review_text: I have tried various options to help with my house cleaning and I have no doubt that The Maids are the best option. They do a thorough job, taking care of the details, are proactive, they are reliable and trustworthy, punctual and always open to suggestions and improving their service. I have recommended them various times and I have nothing but good words about them. Thank you! Service: Standard cleaning
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with great feedback, Constanza! Our team is dedicated to providing the most thorough clean in the business while maintaining efficiency, promptness and friendliness. We look forward to servicing your home again soon.

reviews.review_text: I started using the Maids  when I had injured my leg and could no longer clean the house myself.  My leg is now better, but I have continued to use the Maids cleaning service.  The team is professional, efficient and does a good job cleaning bathrooms and vacuuming up all the cat fur.  Thank you.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Diana thank you for your glowing review of The Maids! Happy customers have helped build our business through referring friends and family and online review sharing, so we appreciate that you took the time to share your great experience with others. If there is anything we can do to make your experience with The Maids even better, please let us know.

reviews.review_text: I called Bruce on Wednesday to come into my family home for a deep clean. He was able to get us in the next day! The team of 3 came out and very graciously listened to my mom s requests and started right away. We had to leave to go to hospital so we weren t able to see the completed job. When we returned home there were a couple things missed. We contacted Bruce again and he was more than happy to abide by the company s 24 hour policy. He himself came out the next morning with one of his staff and completely redid everything along with the couple things missed. The job was immaculate and very professional. I highly recommend The Maids for your cleaning needs. Thank you again Bruce for being so understanding and professional it s very much appreciated
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Talissa, thank you so much for taking the time to write this amazing review. The Maids is the leader in the home cleaning industry, not because of how quickly and effectively we are able to clean any home, but because of how much we care about our customers. We have our own high standards for home cleaning, but at the end of the day, if youre not completely happy with our service, then thats when we make sure to clean to your standards. We were more than happy to clean for you and your mother. Thanks again, and we hope you have an amazing weekend!

reviews.review_text: Been spoiled for years by The Maids, every two weeks. They do an amazing job and at an excellent price. The teams have never disappointed and go out of their way to make sure youre happy. They handle any special requests efficiently.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow, Kevin   thank you for the five-star review! Our entire team at The Maids takes pride in making your life easier (and cleaner!). We sincerely appreciate your business over the years and look forward to cleaning for you again soon! Stay Safe!

reviews.review_text: Bruce and his team are very professional. The staff are always very courteous, on time, and do a very thorough clean.  I am very happy with their services, and would recommend them to anyone who needs cleaning services. Very satisfied customer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Linda, we appreciate your 5-star rating and your customer loyalty. As you can tell, we take customer service very seriously and well be sure to let the team know how pleased you are with the service. Thank you for trusting us with your home. We look forward to seeing you again.

reviews.review_text: The Maids have been cleaning my home bi-weekly since mid-2019. They are fast, efficient, friendly, and great value. I have recommended The Maids to friends and family.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Andrea as one of our long-term customers, we can t thank you enough for taking the time to review us on Google+.  Our team is dedicated to providing the most thorough clean in the business while maintaining efficiency, promptness and friendliness. If there s anything else we can do to make your experience with The Maids even better, please let us know.

reviews.review_text: Very impressed! Booked them for a move-out clean and they were very thorough throughout the booking process up until the day of the service. They left the condo sparkling! Will definitely be using them again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with great feedback, Grace! Our team is dedicated to providing the most thorough clean in the business while maintaining efficiency, promptness and friendliness. We are glad you liked the sparkle! We look forward to servicing your home again soon.

reviews.review_text: Excellent crew!  Always reliable, on time and very professional.  Friendly and great service.  No surprises with cost- their original cleaning estimate for regular service was accurate and they always stick within it and get the job done.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Judith, thank you for taking the time to rate our business on Google. If theres anything we can do to make your next experience with The Maids five star, please let us know.

reviews.review_text: This company was totally awesome. After many years in my appartment , the Maids did a fantastic job , It feels fresh and looks great . I am gonna have them come back and do more cleaning , Huge 5 star raings
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Rick thank you for your glowing review of The Maids! Happy customers have helped build our business through referring friends and family and online review sharing, so we appreciate that you took the time to share your great experience with others. If there is anything we can do to make your experience with The Maids even better, please let us know. Stay Safe!

reviews.review_text: Quickly responded to our initial call for a quote.  A very polite and efficient team left our place spotless in a short time.  Very impressed with the quality of the service- will definitely use on a recurring basis.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with The Maids, Patrick! We pride ourselves on providing the most thorough clean in the industry, and are glad you found that to be the case. Let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next experience with us even better!

reviews.review_text: These guys went above and beyond cleaning our place. Very professional cleaners didnt leave a trace of dirt or dust. By far the best managed cleaning company Ive ever dealt with. Were now using their services bi-weekly on a set schedule.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Evan as one of our regular customers, we can t thank you enough for taking the time to review us on Google.  Our entire team at The Maids appreciates your business and we look forward to servicing your home again soon!

reviews.review_text: We employ this service for a monthly home clean. They are prompt, reliable, and thorough, which we appreciate. I would recommend them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad you had a great experience, Lauren. Thank you for recommending our service and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: The Maids team were always very friendly, on time and efficiant. The organization and planning of the visits was provided by the managment without any problems as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with great feedback, Susanne! Our team is dedicated to providing the most thorough clean in the business while maintaining efficiency, promptness and friendliness. We look forward to servicing your home again soon.

reviews.review_text: We have been using The Maids service for over a year now and the cleaning has always been spot on, the admin staff are very responsive and flexible when needed. I would highly recommend The Maids!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Kyle as one of our regular customers, we can t thank you enough for taking the time to review us on Google.  Our entire team at The Maids appreciates your business over the past year, and we look forward to servicing you and your home for many more!  Stay Safe!

reviews.review_text: I have been a client of this service for over a year now. I am very happy with the new ownership and the attention to doing a great job. As a business owner myself, I am sensitive to the impact of old dated reviews as they do speak to the current experience. With confidence I recommend this service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Patrick, and thank you so much for taking the time to write this review.  Were thrilled to see that youre happy with all the hard work of our home cleaners.  It means a lot that you took a chance with us, and were very happy to have your business and your feedback.  Thank you so much.  We look forward to our next visit.

reviews.review_text: Have used them for over 5 years and very happy with the service they provide great people that come to clean my home and the office is always very accommodating to change my schedule. i would recommend them to anyone that wants a detailed job
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Michael, thank you for your past business and taking the time to review our services on Google. We look forward to cleaning for you again soon.

reviews.review_text: I like the team approach. Several workers mean the job is done in a conveniently short time The workers are competent and professional. I am happy to recommend The Maids.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Penny we can t thank you enough for leaving us a five-star review! Our team takes great pride in providing exceptional service and the most thorough clean in the business. reviews.review_text: I asked the maids to come by and clean the house, while my wife was at work. They did an amazing job I couldt believe how thorough it was. Thank you The Maids of Vancouver. See you in 2 weeks!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow, Bryson   thank you for the five-star review! Our entire team at The Maids takes pride in making your life easier (and cleaner!). We sincerely appreciate your business and look forward to cleaning for you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I have been a very satisfied client of The Maids of Vancouver for a year and a half. They do a great job. I recommend them highly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for taking the time to recommend our business on Google! We value you as a customer and look forward to your next clean, Linda.

reviews.review_text: Enjoyed the service and overall job the maids did! Will be using the monthly service moving forward!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Drew, thank you so much for the review. We will share this with the team and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: i had them in to do a move out clean and what a great job they did will be sure to use them again very fast efficient and the price was good
I have used Maids for over two years. I enjoy coming home to a clean, fresh house

reviews.review_text: Had them in to do a clean. They did a very good clean, very respectful. I continue to Use there services
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for sharing these comments, . We strive to provide excellent service to our customers at The Maids of Vancouver.

reviews.review_text: Great service, punctual, very friendly and good customer service. I totally recommend it!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with great feedback, Patricia! Our team is dedicated to providing the most thorough clean in the business while maintaining efficiency, promptness and friendliness. We look forward to servicing your home again soon.

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend the maids - great service, and vey professional.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with our business on Google! We appreciate your business over the past year and look forward to cleaning for you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Environmentally friendly cleaning products and good quality
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Kenneth.  Were happy with the products that we use too.  Every little bit helps clean our homes and our planet.

reviews.review_text: Did a great job and on point!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with our business on Google, Lucas! We appreciate your business over the past year and look forward to cleaning for you again soon!
Hi Marcus, thank you for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star review. I am so pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!
Thank you for the 5 Star rating! Stay Safe!
Really appreciate the rating. Is there anything you d like to share that we can pass along to the team?

reviews.review_text: I have used their services for many, many years.  They are reliable, trust worthy, & they work in a fast paced environment with nice people.  The team cares about you.  If you tell them ahead of time they will do extra jobs for you while at your place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Carol, we re thrilled to get this kind of feedback.Thank you for taking the time to review us. It has been such a pleasure to serve you all these years and we truly appreciate your business. See you soon!

reviews.review_text: They are coming back because they are that good  . This company is the best!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alison! Thank you so much for your kind words and support. Were thrilled to know that you had a great experience with our company. We take pride in providing the best service possible and we cant wait to serve you again in the future!

reviews.review_text: I have used the Maids service over the past 19 years. They do a great job and the employees are excellent . I can not say how awesome I feel when I walk in my door and find my house spotless. Thanks Maids you make my day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: David, as one of our long-time customers we thank you for your business and taking the time to review us on Google. We take great pride in making your life easier and cleaner!

reviews.review_text: They are always on time and professional. Special requests are easily and gladly handled.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Mark, thank you for taking the time to rate our business on Google. If theres anything we can do to make your next experience with The Maids five star, please let us know.

reviews.review_text: Had some unclear communication, and was charged more than I had expected/what was quoted for me. Was quoted for 60 minutes of cleaning which included 3 Maids. 4 maids ended showing up (without my knowing ahead of time) and I ended up being billed higher due to this. All in all, my kitchen and bathroom was cleaned well. The girls were very sweet and polite, but also looked extremely young (almost students/teens) and maybe thats what took them longer for the cleaning. Service: Standard cleaning
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for using The Maids and we re sorry there was confusion on the pricing, Elle.  When setting up service over the phone, we try to collect as much information about the home to provide an estimate for how long our team of four will need to be in the home.  It is just an estimate until we get to the home to clean.  At that time the manager or team supervisor communicates more specific information on how long it will take to provide a professional, quality clean and can always customize the service to best meet your cleaning and budget needs.   We apologize that there was a miscommunication on your estimate. We do appreciate your feedback as all comments help us improve our communications with customers.

reviews.review_text: Our experience with this company was absolute dire. Once we vacated our house, I personally even cleaned the house for the cleaners ! For two and half hours they charged us over $400 then they called to ask for more since it was too dirty!!!! Money grabbing & unethica company. I would never recommend them nor use them again.

reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Emily, we are unable to locate your name in our customer database. Was your clean booked under a different name? Do you perhaps have The Maids confused with a different cleaning company? If that s the case, we d ask that you remove your review as we take our online reputation very seriously. If not, we d ask that you contact our office so we can resolve the situation with our 100% satisfaction guarantee, 604-987-8181. Local business owners, including The Maids, take pride in their business and when a negative review is posted on the wrong page, it can be frustrating and unfair. We d really appreciate your assistance in ensuring the review is placed for the correct business.
